roleset.name: occurring at different times (contrasts with recurrence: a metachronous cancer is a new, different cancer, not a recurrence of the prior cancer)

role.descr: prior thing that's being distinguished from ARG1

example.name: metachronous-j
example.text: Patient presents with metachronous colon cancer with synchronous colon lesions .
example.amr: (p / present-102 :ARG0 (p2 / patient-yy) :ARG1 (c / cancer-03 :pl + :ARG1 p2 :ARG2 (a / anatomical-site :name (n / name :op1 "colon")) :ARG1-of (m / metachronous-01) :subevent (s / sign-symptom :pl + :name (n2 / name :op1 "lesion") :location a :ARG1-of (s2 / synchronous-02))))
